DESCRIPTION: Manage and configure Hope's Applications addon.
EXAMPLE:
{{prefix}}app enable **- to activate the addon**
{{prefix}}auto-animes disable **- to disable the addon**
{{prefix}}app add** - to add an question**
{{prefix}}app remove ** - to remove an question**
{{prefix}}app questions** - to see the list of current questions**
{{prefix}}app log** - to set the log channel**
{{prefix}}app review** - to see the list of applications pending approval**
{{prefix}}app approve** - to approve a user application**
{{prefix}}app decline** - to declined a user's application**
